sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import { Link, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; const subcats = { 'fruits-vegetables': [ { id: 'all', title: 'All' }, { id: 'fresh-fruits', title: 'Fresh Fruits' }, { id: 'fresh-vegetables', title: 'Fresh Vegetables' }, ], 'dairy-eggs': [ { id: 'all', title: 'All' }, { id: 'milk', title: 'Milk & Dairy' }, { id: 'eggs', title: 'Eggs' }, ], }; const sampleFreshFruits = [ { id: 'apple', name: 'Apple', price: 120, image: '/images/apple.png' }, { id: 'banana', name: 'Banana', price: 40, image: '/images/bananas.png' }, { id: 'mango', name: 'Mango', price: 200, image: '/images/mango.png' }, { id: 'papaya', name: 'Papaya', price: 50, image: '/images/papaya.png' }, { id: 'grapes', name: 'Grapes', price: 150, image: '/images/grapes.png' }, { id: 'pineapple', name: 'Pineapple', price: 90, image: '/images/pineapple.png' }, { id: 'guava', name: 'Guava', price: 70, image: '/images/guava.png' }, { id: 'pear', name: 'Pear', price: 160, image: '/images/pear.png' }, { id: 'watermelon', name: 'Watermelon', price: 30, image: '/images/watermelon.png' }, ]; const sampleFreshVegetables = [ { id: 'tomato', name: 'Tomato', price: 30, image: '/images/tomato.svg' }, { id: 'potato', name: 'Potato', price: 25 }, { id: 'onion', name: 'Onion', price: 28 }, { id: 'cabbage', name: 'Cabbage', price: 22 }, { id: 'carrot', name: 'Carrot', price: 60 }, { id: 'spinach', name: 'Spinach', price: 40 }, { id: 'capsicum', name: 'Capsicum', price: 90 }, { id: 'brinjal', name: 'Brinjal', price: 55 }, { id: 'bottle-gourd', name: 'Bottle Gourd', price: 35 }, { id: 'okra', name: 'Okra', price: 70 }, ]; const sampleDairy = [ { id: 'full-cream-milk', name: 'Full Cream Milk 1L', price: 70, image: '/images/milk.svg' }, { id: 'toned-milk', name: 'Toned Milk 1L', price: 60, image: '/images/milk.svg' }, { id: 'salted-butter', name: 'Salted Butter 200g', price: 150, image: '/images/butter.svg' }, { id: 'mozzarella-cheese', name: 'Mozzarella Cheese 200g', price: 420, image: '/images/cheese.svg' }, { id: 'cheddar-cheese', name: 'Cheddar Cheese 200g', price: 450, image: '/images/cheese.svg' }, { id: 'fresh-cream', name: 'Fresh Cream 200ml', price: 90, image: '/images/cream.svg' }, { id: 'plain-yogurt', name: 'Plain Yogurt 500g', price: 160, image: '/images/yogurt.svg' }, { id: 'greek-yogurt', name: 'Greek Yogurt 400g', price: 280, image: '/images/yogurt.svg' }, { id: 'ghee', name: 'Ghee 500g', price: 650, image: '/images/ghee.svg' }, { id: 'milk-powder', name: 'Milk Powder 500g', price: 500, image: '/images/milk-powder.svg' }, { id: 'eggs', name: 'Eggs (dozen)', price: 200, image: '/images/eggs.svg' }, ]; export default function CategoryDetail(){ const { slug, sub } = useParams(); const items = subcats[slug] || [{id:'all', title:'All'}]; const showSub = sub || null; return (

{slug.replace('-', ' & ')}

Categories
{items.map(it => ( {it.title} ))}
{slug === 'fruits-vegetables' && ((!showSub || showSub === 'all')) ? (

Fresh Fruits — Price per kg

{sampleFreshFruits.map(p => (
{p.image ? ( ) : (
)}
{p.name}
₹{p.price} / kg
))}

Fresh Vegetables — Price per kg

{sampleFreshVegetables.map(p => (
{p.name}
₹{p.price} / kg
))}
) : slug === 'fruits-vegetables' && showSub=== 'fresh-fruits' ? (

Fresh Fruits — Price per kg

{sampleFreshFruits.map(p => (
{p.name}
₹{p.price} / kg
))}
) : slug === 'fruits-vegetables' && showSub === 'fresh-vegetables' ? (

Fresh Vegetables — Price per kg

{sampleFreshVegetables.map(p => (
{p.name}
₹{p.price} / kg
))}
) : slug === 'dairy-eggs' && ((!showSub || showSub === 'all')) ? (

Dairy & Eggs

{sampleDairy.map(p => (
{p.image ? ( ) : (
)}
{p.name}
₹{p.price}
))}
) : slug === 'dairy-eggs' && showSub === 'milk' ? (

Milk Products

{sampleDairy.filter(p => p.id.includes('milk')).map(p => (
{p.name}
₹{p.price}
))}
) : slug === 'dairy-eggs' && showSub === 'eggs' ? (

Eggs

{sampleDairy.filter(p => p.id === 'eggs').map(p => (
{p.name}
₹{p.price}
))}
) : (
Select a subcategory to view items.
)}
); }
